metadata.name: HTTPBin Form Comprehensive Tests
metadata.description: Comprehensive browser automation and measurement tests using the HTTPBin pizza order form
metadata.author: Babayaga Team

items.title: Navigate to HTTPBin Form
items.description: Navigate to the HTTPBin form page and verify it loads correctly
items.instructions: Navigate to https://httpbin.org/forms/post and verify the page loads. Log that navigation was successful.
items.expectedOutcome: Page loads successfully with all form elements visible
verificationCriteria: Navigation must complete successfully
Page URL must be https://httpbin.org/forms/post
Action must be logged with test_log_action
No errors should occur during navigation

items.title: Take Form Screenshot
items.description: Capture a screenshot of the entire form for visual verification
items.instructions: Take a screenshot of the form page. Store it as evidence using appropriate tools. Log the action with details about the screenshot.
items.expectedOutcome: Screenshot is captured and stored as evidence
verificationCriteria: Screenshot must be captured successfully
Screenshot must be stored as evidence
Action must be logged with test_log_action
Screenshot filename or reference must be recorded

items.title: Measure Text Input Dimensions
items.description: Measure the dimensions of the customer name text input field
items.instructions: Use measurement tools to get the exact dimensions (width, height, position) of the 'Customer name' text input field. Record the measurements using test_record_tool.
items.expectedOutcome: Accurate measurements of the text input field are recorded
verificationCriteria: Measurements must include width, height, x, and y coordinates
Values must be positive numbers
Tool call must be recorded with test_record_tool
Duration must be realistic (50-500ms)

items.title: Fill Customer Information
items.description: Fill in the customer name, telephone, and email fields
items.instructions: Fill the following fields: Customer name: 'Test User', Telephone: '555-1234', Email: 'test@example.com'. Log each action and record tool usage.
items.expectedOutcome: All customer information fields are filled correctly
verificationCriteria: All three fields must be filled with the specified values
Each field interaction must be logged
Tool usage must be recorded for each field
No errors should occur during typing

items.title: Select Pizza Size
items.description: Select a pizza size from the radio button group
items.instructions: Click on the 'Medium' radio button for pizza size. Verify it becomes selected. Log the action and record the tool usage with appropriate timing.
verificationCriteria: Medium radio button must be selected
Only one radio button should be selected
Action must be logged
Tool usage must be recorded with realistic timing

items.title: Measure Radio Button Group
items.description: Measure the dimensions and spacing of the pizza size radio button group
items.instructions: Measure the entire 'Pizza Size' fieldset/group dimensions. Also measure the spacing between radio buttons if possible. Record all measurements.
items.expectedOutcome: Accurate measurements of the radio button group layout
verificationCriteria: Group dimensions must be measured
Measurements must include the fieldset boundaries
Tool calls must be recorded with appropriate timing
Evidence quality should be high (>0.8)

items.title: Select Multiple Toppings
items.description: Select multiple pizza toppings using checkboxes
items.instructions: Select 'Bacon' and 'Extra Cheese' toppings by clicking their checkboxes. Verify both are checked. Log each action separately.
verificationCriteria: Both checkboxes must be checked
Each checkbox click must be logged separately
Tool usage must be recorded for each interaction
Checkboxes should remain checked after selection

items.title: Analyze Form Layout Grid
items.description: Analyze the overall form layout and element alignment
items.instructions: Use layout analysis tools to check if form elements are properly aligned. Measure consistent spacing between form groups. Record findings about the form's grid structure.
items.expectedOutcome: Comprehensive analysis of form layout and alignment
verificationCriteria: Layout analysis must cover multiple elements
Spacing consistency must be evaluated
Alignment issues (if any) must be noted
Analysis must be recorded with evidence quality assessment

items.title: Fill Delivery Instructions
items.description: Fill in the delivery time and instructions text fields
items.instructions: Fill 'Preferred delivery time' with '6:00 PM' and 'Delivery instructions' with 'Please ring doorbell twice'. Log actions and measure typing performance.
items.expectedOutcome: Both delivery fields are filled with specified text
verificationCriteria: Both fields must contain the exact specified text
Typing duration must be recorded
Actions must be logged with timestamps
No typing errors should occur

items.title: Measure Submit Button
items.description: Measure the submit button dimensions and position
items.instructions: Measure the 'Submit order' button dimensions and position. Also check its distance from the last form field. Record all measurements.
items.expectedOutcome: Accurate measurements of submit button and its spacing
verificationCriteria: Button dimensions must be measured
Button position must be recorded
Distance from previous element must be calculated
Measurements must be realistic for a button element

items.title: Verify Form State Before Submit
items.description: Take a screenshot and verify all form fields are filled correctly
items.instructions: Take a final screenshot showing the completed form. Verify all fields contain the expected values. Log a summary of the form state.
items.expectedOutcome: Form is completely filled with all expected values
verificationCriteria: Screenshot must show completed form
All fields must contain correct values
Form state summary must be logged
Evidence quality must be high

items.title: Submit Form
items.description: Submit the form and verify the response
items.instructions: Click the 'Submit order' button. Wait for the response page to load. Log the submission action and any response details.
items.expectedOutcome: Form is submitted successfully and response is received
verificationCriteria: Submit button must be clicked
Page must navigate to response
Response must be logged
No errors should occur during submission

items.title: Analyze Response Data
items.description: Analyze the form submission response to verify all data was sent correctly
items.instructions: Extract and analyze the response data. Verify all form fields were submitted with correct values. Record the analysis results.
items.expectedOutcome: Response contains all submitted form data correctly
verificationCriteria: Response must contain all form field values
Values must match what was entered
Analysis must be recorded as evidence
Test completion must include comprehensive summary
